SOAP Notes Format in EMR

SOAP stands for Subjective, Objective, Assessment and Plan
Date of Encounter: replacedoa
Provider: replacedname
 
Subjective: sText
 
Objective: oText
 
Assessment: aText
 
Plan: pText
